title: ANSIS Root Entity Schema
description: Identifies root elements currently served by ANSIS.
$comment: Based on, but not fully compliant with, the top-level objects defined in the [JSON API](https://jsonapi.org/format/#document-top-level) Specification.

$schema.description: The identifier of this JSON Schema. Allows instance documents to be linked to this schema for validation.

data.description: An array containing the document’s target resource (an ANSIS Landscape Survey/Soil Site).

included.description: Arrays of objects that are related to the primary data and/or each other (“included resources”) - e.g. a Project. Objects in these arrays will be accessed via JSON pointers in the source objects.

meta.description: Non-ANSIS response metadata summarising the contents of the document.

timeStamp.description: The data and time this document was created.

numberReturned.description: Number of objects in the 'data' array.

numberMatched.description: Number of objects the matched the filter used when generating this document.

numberWithheld.description: Number of objects the matched the filter used when generating this document but we not returned due to user access restrictions.
